title: 2stout
author: 2stout
created_time: July 04, 2022, 08:10:09 AMLast edit: September 14, 2022, 02:49:14 PM by 2stout
content: To my Continental South American Bitcoiners!I’ve done deals and goodwill all around the world concerning Bitcoin collectibles.  Curiously, I wondered how many continents this involved.  Surprisingly, excluding Antarctica (have some ideas, more about this later), the only one remaining is South America, but this will no longer be the case after this raffle.  Winner will receive items as pictured- One, 1oz Silver, 24kt Gold Plated "Bitcoin" Binary Round and One, Alpen Coin Custom Funded coin, #C009 (This series is prefixed with C and all were factory funded with 0.0001BTC)- https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/19AXTTn86TYyofMpNUthwK8Uibsurn7Hux  Free USPS international priority mail shipping or private shipping, depending on which is applicable.  Continental South American addresses only for raffle entry.  Also, must be a Copper Member, Jr. Member, or higher member for entry.  Please no alts that will result in multiple entries.  In return, I ask that you consider +Meriting the OP if you believe these types of raffles benefit the community and/or if you would like to show your appreciation.Pics:  How this will work:Pick a table and a slot.  I will select a block and last character will select the table.  If last character doesn't result in a table selection, then block(s) will be selected until so.  Once table has been determined, I will select another block and the last character will determine the winner.  Buena Suerte/Boa Sorte!Table 6:0 -  bitmover1 -  tg882 -  3 -  dgcarlosleon  4 -  famososMuertos5 -  6 -  TryNinja7 -  Artemis38 -  JakobFugger9 -  bavicryptoa -  b -  rdluffy  c -  sabotag3xd -  alegotardoe -  darxiaomif -  willi9974 Table 8:0 -  sabotag3x   1 -  JakobFugger2 -  TryNinja3 -  rdluffy4 -  Artemis35 -  bavicrypto6 -  willi99747 -  darxiaomi8 -  tg889 -  dgcarlosleon a -  b -  c -  bitmoverd -  famososMuertose -  alegotardof -

comments.author: willi9974
comments.body: Thanks for that great coin…Can I have please Table 6 / slot f for willi9974Best regards,Willi

comments.author: sam00
comments.body: Hey 2stout!This raffle is looking really great!Did I unterstand this correctly that only people residing in south america are eligible to join the raffle?If not, I‘ll gladly choose spot #0 on table 6.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: sam00 on July 04, 2022, 08:34:11 AMHey 2stout!This raffle is looking really great!Did I unterstand this correctly that only people residing in south america are eligible to join the raffle?If not, I‘ll gladly choose spot #0 on table 6.Hi sam00!  Correct, this for our fellow bitcoiners in continental South America.  I've done deals and goodwill on every continent except here and would like to show them some love as well.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: willi9974 on July 04, 2022, 08:27:17 AMThanks for that great coin…Can I have please Table 6 / slot f for willi9974Best regards,Willi Hi Willi!  Assume you have a continental South America address?  If so, I will assign you the slot.  Just asking as it seems there have been some misunderstandings about this raffle; however, it is for our fellow bitcoiners in continental South America only.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on July 04, 2022, 07:04:12 PMmaybe you should ping those fellow bitcoiners to get this great raffle filled  I don't really have a certain idea who they may be but I know they exist.  If you are one please feel free to grab a slot; also, please feel free to assist if you wish.  I just take the approach, as I have in the past, that if I post the raffle, the entrants will come.  I'm all for getting this raffle filled and spreading the love.

comments.author: willi9974
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on July 04, 2022, 07:04:33 PMQuote from: willi9974 on July 04, 2022, 08:27:17 AMThanks for that great coin…Can I have please Table 6 / slot f for willi9974Best regards,Willi Hi Willi!  Assume you have a continental South America address?  If so, I will assign you the slot.  Just asking as it seems there have been some misunderstandings about this raffle; however, it is for our fellow bitcoiners in continental South America only.When I win it I tell you a adress in south america for reshipping it to Germany.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Love the idea  It may be worth posting this in the Spanish  section of the forum - obs aimed at the Spanish speaking countries there and the Portuguese  (Brazil) I’m sure there must be some collectibles  regulars who speak these languages who can link a post to this thread ?At the very least it promotes the collectibles section of the forum to some folks who don’t know about it.Good luck 2stout - commendable idea

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: willi9974 on July 04, 2022, 07:18:09 PMQuote from: 2stout on July 04, 2022, 07:04:33 PMQuote from: willi9974 on July 04, 2022, 08:27:17 AMThanks for that great coin…Can I have please Table 6 / slot f for willi9974Best regards,Willi Hi Willi!  Assume you have a continental South America address?  If so, I will assign you the slot.  Just asking as it seems there have been some misunderstandings about this raffle; however, it is for our fellow bitcoiners in continental South America only.When I win it I tell you a adress in south america for reshipping it to Germany.Gotcha, Thx!

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on July 04, 2022, 09:18:51 PMLove the idea  It may be worth posting this in the Spanish  section of the forum - obs aimed at the Spanish speaking countries there and the Portuguese  (Brazil) I’m sure there must be some collectibles  regulars who speak these languages who can link a post to this thread ?At the very least it promotes the collectibles section of the forum to some folks who don’t know about it.Good luck 2stout - commendable idea  Thx for the support and suggestions Mbitr.  This is a great idea as it should cover the 2 major languages, ensuring a wide audience.  Also, didn't think about the potential to promote the collectibles section- this would be good too for more awareness and as a place for more collectors to gather.  Will be looking into this.
